Title: Pingu at the Fairground
Plot: Pingu, Pinga, Mother and Father go to the funfair. They pass some balloons but don?t buy one. They come to a barrel organ, Pingu gives the player some money and he plays a tune. Pingu and Pinga rush on and stop at a candyfloss seller, and they both have some. At the ?hit the tins? stall Pingu has a go, gets all the tins down in his three throws, and receives a lollipop as a prize.
